May 21, 1938 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Test Piece Contest
La Regina di Golconda
Victoria Park, Holmfirth Prizes - 1st £14 and cup, 2nd £10 and shield, 3rd £7, 4th £4, 5th £2. March contest (Imperator) - 1st £2, 2nd £1.
March contest - 1st Denby Dale, 2nd Sowerby Bridge. 12 bands competed.
